Description

Incorporated on 5 March 2002 with headquarters in Al Shuwaikh, Kuwait. Al Argan International Real Estate is a shareholding company operating within the Real Estate sector. The company specializes in real estate acquisition, sale, construction, development, maintenance, property management and consulting for hotels, commercial and residential projects across Kuwait, Bahrain, Oman and Saudi Arabia. The company has several subsidiaries domiciled in Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Egypt, Oman, Morocco and United Kingdom. Al Argan International Real Estate is a public company listed on Kuwait Stock Exchange since 23 July 2007.
